mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Edgar C. Vaughn
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Edgar C. Vaughn Ira J. McGrady, Guardian until he resigned 05.10.1898 Henry C. Turman, Guardian beginning 054.10.1898 Recorded in Ledger Book 5, page 13, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
